sentences.en: All the newspapers reported on the football match of France versus Italy.
sentences.cn: 所有的报纸都报道了法国队对意大利队的足球比赛。

sentences.en: Anne wouldn't mind going to Italy or France to live.
sentences.cn: 安妮很愿意去意大利或法国定居。

sentences.en: Egypt drew two of their matches in Italy.
sentences.cn: 埃及在意大利收获了两场平局。

sentences.en: French troops negotiated the Alps and went on the road in Italy.
sentences.cn: 法军成功地越过了阿尔卑斯山脉，行军在意大利的国土上。

sentences.en: From 1879 to 1888 he wandered about Germany, Switzerland, and Italy.
sentences.cn: 从1879到1888年，他游历于德国、瑞士和意大利等地。

sentences.en: Gray is thought to be in hiding near the France/Italy border.
sentences.cn: 他们认为格雷藏在法国和意大利边境附近。

sentences.en: He has coached and played in Italy during the Australian off-season.
sentences.cn: 他趁澳大利亚的休赛期在意大利执教并参加比赛。

sentences.en: He is likely to be called up for Thursday's match against Italy.
sentences.cn: 他有可能被选中参加星期四对意大利的比赛。

sentences.en: He was Italy's top scorer during the World Cup matches.
sentences.cn: 他是世界杯比赛期间意大利队进球最多的球员。

sentences.en: In 1882 Germany, Austria, and Italy formed the Triple Alliance.
sentences.cn: 1882年，德国、奥地利和意大利组成了三国同盟。

sentences.en: In Italy people hardly ever cohabit.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，很少有人未婚同居。

sentences.en: In Italy, as elsewhere, television has made deep inroads into cinema.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，跟在别处一样，电视严重影响了电影市场，夺走了大批观众。

sentences.en: Italy wanted naval parity with France.
sentences.cn: 意大利想要在海军实力上与法国平起平坐。

sentences.en: Robinson was sent to Italy to cover the 1990 World Cup.
sentences.cn: 鲁宾逊被派到意大利报道1990年的世界杯比赛。

sentences.en: The annual slaughter of wildlife in Italy is horrific.
sentences.cn: 在意大利，每年大量捕杀野生动物的现象令人震惊。

sentences.en: The Kingdom of Italy formally came into being on 17 March 1861.
sentences.cn: 意大利王国于1861年3月17日正式成立。

sentences.en: The refugees were put in camps in Italy before being resettled.
sentences.cn: 这些难民在重新定居之前被安置在意大利的难民营中。

sentences.en: They decided to swan around Italy this summer.
sentences.cn: 他们决定今年夏天去意大利游逛。

phrases.tran_cn: 小意大利（美国大城市的意大利移民区）
